backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with storage mixins, access control, and comprehensive data models for users, deals, buyers, contracts, payments, analytics, and Stripe integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs with high‑confidence classifications.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing styling, pages, components, and logic improvements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes plus global background and border utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level app managing startup flow, authentication, profile loading, routing, and detailed error classification.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Simple card UI showing an access‑denied message with optional back navigation.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Displays detailed deal analysis results including ARV, MAO, comps, and rating with styled badges.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application shell managing navigation, lazy-loaded pages, mobile menu, and user logout. It renders different pages based on selected navigation state.
frontend/src/components/AppShellErrorBou: Error boundary component that displays a fallback UI when page rendering fails and allows resetting.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays a buyer’s basic details, contact info, preferences, and budget with an edit action.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Dialog for creating, editing, and deleting buyers with form fields and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Lists all contracts for a deal with status badges, error/loading states, and download functionality.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Handles file selection, validation, and uploading of contract documents with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Shows a deal’s address, seller, financial metrics, and provides an edit action.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Dialog for creating and editing deals, managing form state, loading data, and submitting create/update/delete mutations.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a locked feature card prompting users to upgrade to a required membership tier.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Generates a bar chart summarizing profit and estimated fees by month for the last six months.
frontend/src/components/OpaqueCard.tsx: Provides an opaque Card wrapper enforcing solid backgrounds and re-exports card subcomponents.
frontend/src/components/OpaqueOverlays.t: Opaque wrappers for dialog, sheet, and select components to disable transparency and blur effects.
frontend/src/components/PageQueryErrorSt: Error state UI showing a message with optional retry, secondary actions, and contact support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: First-time profile setup dialog that initializes user permissions and saves basic profile data.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Renders a table listing total profit grouped by zip code.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Sign-in screen using Internet Identity with branding, login button, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays a startup error screen with message, stage info, and expandable technical details, including error classification hints.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Shows a branded loading screen with logo, wordmark, spinner, and optional loading message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Builds an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with optional admin token, handling identity initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity restoration, state management, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Implements a hook for media query matching and a helper for mobile detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for backend operations, including a startup-safe user profile fetch with timeout and error normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based light and dark theme variables and utility classes for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/authErrors.ts: Provides utilities to detect auth, timeout, and network errors and return user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Centralized text constants for navigation, errors, empty states, locked features, admin UI, and support messages.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Implements MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fee calculations for deals.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Defines membership-based access rules and helper for generating locked feature messages.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Formats and parses currency values in cents and computes annual savings and monthly equivalents.
frontend/src/lib/support.ts: Provides support email constant and utilities to build or open mailto links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing membership pricing, granting tiers, and configuring Stripe.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Enterprise-only analytics dashboard showing performance metrics and profit by zip code.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Pro or Enterprise page for viewing, adding, and editing cash buyers with error and lock handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Enterprise-only page for selecting deals and managing contract uploads with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays key deal metrics, charts, and membership info using fetched deals and user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: Provides an AI-powered deal analyzer with form inputs and lets users add analyzed deals to the pipeline.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Shows all deals organized by stage, allows creating and editing deals, and enforces membership limits.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Shows membership tiers, pricing, and starts Stripe checkout sessions for upgrades.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Informs users that a payment was canceled and provides options to retry or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirms membership purchase using the session ID, updates the user profile, and provides navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters and hash routes, and persist or clear parameters in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and component extensions for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, known issues, and feature requirements for fixing profile-loading and authentication flows.
